Name: Happiness Tea
Desc: Increases all teammates' DEF by 12% and max HP by 10%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonator in Co-op Mode.
Bg: One of the traditional handmade drinks of Huanglong, implying "double happiness". The method of making it is simple, just dry the fresh Honeysuckle, stir-fry it with Lemongrass, and pour it into boiling water. Add a little Caltrop before drinking to add sweetness. The finished product is sour and sweet, with a slightly bitter aftertaste, which helps digestion, so it is often seen on the festival table.
